amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Senate vitiated previous adoption of amendement SA 3292, not withstanding passage of S. 4698, under the order of 9/23/24.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3292 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3292 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Peters.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3292 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Peters.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3292 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
